description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Shell Injection vulnerability in ROS (Robot Operating System) Melodic Morenia versions ROS_VERSION 1 and ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, allows attackers to execute arbitrary code, escalate privileges, and obtain sensitive information.

Vulnerabilidad de inyección de Shell en ROS (Robot Operating System) Melodic Morenia versiones ROS_VERSION 1 y ROS_PYTHON_VERSION 3, permite a atacantes ejecutar código arbitrario, escalar privilegios y obtener información confidencial.
